about_the_game:
Why not all four?

This DLC gives you a chance to date all four Oni at once!  Engage in a mutual polyamorous relationship with all four Oni where they're devoted to you, BUT ALSO EACH OTHER!

  • Two Fivesomes

  • Shudo/Hanyo Scene

  • Nensu/Aku Scene

  • Shudo/Nensu Scene

  • Hanyo/Aku Scene

  • Nensu/Hanyo Scene

  • Shudo/Aku Scene

  • Plus a Chance to Revisit all the Asano/Oni one on one scenes

See the romance build between Asano and each oni both individually and collectively, and get to see the unique love that already exists between all four oni with each other!

Mina and Sakuna sit this one out...or do they?  Our ninja Ichiro is still looking for love!

content_descriptors.notes: Explicit adult content, references to suicide, mutual polyamorous relationship.
